reviewText: We need a U.S. format!!! This is a fantastic documentary, and brings to light support of endangered tigers, leading to  support of all endangered species. PBS in the U.S. is showing this and many would buy the DVD if available in a U.S. format. It is a sweet look at human/animal interaction, a view of the intelligence and affection of these animals, and an important message to a species which has the ability to be a shepherd to the planet instead of a greedy killer.
